statements: DELETE FROM CrimeData WHERE id = 100 AND crime_type = 'Robbery';
DELETE FROM CrimeData WHERE location = 'Downtown' AND date_time < '2022-01-01' AND incident_description LIKE '%violent%';
DELETE FROM crime_data WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'Main Street';
DELETE FROM policy_decisions WHERE department = 'Finance' AND decision_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM crime_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01' AND crime_type = 'Robbery';
DELETE FROM criminal_records WHERE criminal_age < 18 AND criminal_gender = 'M';
DELETE FROM law_enforcement WHERE agency_location LIKE '%City%'
DELETE FROM Victims WHERE victim_age > 30 AND crime_id = 'ffb0bfc8-8021-4a7a-9309-ec3b5b1737a4';
